org.becelot.becelotUtils

Class WorldVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.util.Vector
      • org.becelot.becelotUtils.WorldVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class WorldVector
extends org.bukkit.util.Vector
    Represents a world vector. Useful, if you need all implemented Vector operations, but need to convert the vector to a location later
    Author:
    Benedict

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct the Vector with provided integer components and a world, this vector belongs to
